attributes.additional_details: My rental is my pension I have already had tenants cause problems that has cost me a fortune and I don’t see the governed helping out here. We are not all bad landlords . Allow landlords to carry on having a contract and lease .
attributes.background: Allow landlords to choose   who rents their property . If the government are going to change the law to zero notice for tenants then it has to be the same for landlords !

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about protection for landlords but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
